title: Riot the lag players are experiencing is probably because of your server
body: I played a bot game today and i asked my teammates if they are experiencing lag spikes and 3 of them said yes. The only member that didn't say yes did not even reply to our chat so he probably did not see them at all. Their ping is 1800, 1000 and me 800. I played on a different account with IGN: KagamiArata pls check the match history and chatlog. I was playing as Renekton in the game and there is a Kassadin, Ezreal, Jax and Tristana. The game is 20:25 minutes long and the date the game is played is 22/07/2015

replies.body: Other than that lets do an experiment. Everyone that is playing a game please ask your teammates if they are experiencing lag spikes and post the results here so we can confirmed if it is Riot's server's problem.

i asked if my team mates ate KFC today and guess what

2 of them said yes, so it must be true right?
I don't think so. Whenever I've lagged it's because my internet has gone crap. Next time you have lag spike do an internet speed test and see for yourself if it is your internet or Riot's servers.
